Pre-Game Insights: Honesty surprised this line opened this low with the current situation with the Hornets.
Duren has an even greater advantage with the Hornets without their best big men, Mark Williams and Nick Richards.
Everything is tilted in Duren's favor in this matchup and I expect him to dominate.
LaMelo could very well go over this line with just points but this is a great spot for his assists to bounce back as well.
LaMelo saw his assists decline after 3 games against the Celtics (x2) and the Timberwolves, two of the best defensive teams in the league that also play at below average Paces.
LaMelo has exceeded this line in 71% of games this season and is averaging 34.3 PA.
